Одна из самых моих любимых игра.

When I was a kid I grew up spending most of my time watching my older brother play video games rather than get to experience it myself. whether it be Halo, The Elder Scrolls, or whatever PS2 game the house had gotten recently. Sometime around 2006 or 7 my family got some piece of trash computer that I don't remember much of being that I was probably at most 7 years old. What I do remember however is the countless hours of my brother playing CS: Source on online servers with our trash internet, him making maps for a "school project", and the one day I got to stay home from school and play on his custom maps. 

They were so horrible from what I remember. One of them was literally a hallway connected by two boxes akin to current day 1v1 maps but with no lighting, all of those orange textures, and a purple and black checkered missing texture skybox. I spent hours that day just walking around the map killing the same 1 white coated Terrorist and being enamored with what my brother had created. Despite being only 7 years old, I remember all of this with nothing but love to this day as a 20 year old. 

oh and the game is fun too, yeah. even with bots this game gives hours upon hours of entertainment so buy it!
Güzel oyun hele 1.85 TL oluyor kesinlikle alın...

Two sets of objectives exist in CS: rescue or defend a group of hostages, or bomb and defend sites of historical importance. Killing the enemy, or completing your objectives, nets you cash, to be spent on deadlier weapons, Kevlar armour and matching earmuffs, grenades, defusing kits, nightvision goggles, and every accessory for the fashion conscious 21st century digital warrior. Half-Life T and integrated voice-chat technology have added to the social experience. For progamers it's less a game, more a way of life.

It works on all kinds of PC, it's comfortable to play and super fun. A great relief for those with anger issues. Hopefully you wouldn't break your mouse or keyboard. Have fun! 
Good Vibes ;3

Counter-Strike: Source is one of the best Online FPS games to date despite its old age, there is still many active players and the community is fantastic. There is rarely any problems with the game/community but when there is its very small.
